programme.title: Nothing Can Stop
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah dua geng remaja yang kaya, Rama-rama dan Scorpions. Kedua-dua kumpulan saingan itu sentiasa bersaing dalam perlumbaan kereta. Mereka daripada keluarga kaya tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka menyedari bahawa kehidupan di luar rumah mereka tidak selalunya mudah dan penuh dengan kekecewaan.

programme.title: Hassan Turbo
programme.desc: Hassan Turbo diminta menjejaki Duan Betis Besi kerana melarikan anak Tok Guru Muay Thai mereka., Salmi. Duan berbuat demikian kerana berdendam dengan Hassan dan Tok Guru kerana menyebabkan kekalahannya dalam perlawanan Muay Thai. Salmi pada awalnya menyukai Duan namun setelah mengetahui sikap sebenar Duan dia mula tawar hati. Hassan berjaya menjejaki Duan di Kuala Lumpur. Sebaliknya Duan membuat pertaruhan jika ingin dapatkan semula Salmi, mereka perlu bertarung semula dan Salmi akan dijadikan sebagai hadiah'.

programme.title: Mentari
programme.desc: Mentari meluahkan hasratnya untuk berkahwin dengan Firash. Namun ayahnya, Dato Ikmal sukar untuk melepaskan anak tunggal kesayangannya kerana dia bimbang akan kehilangan Mentari. Firash merupakan anak kawan baiknya sendiri. Di saat Mentari dan Firash akan disatukan, ibunya mengingatkan Dato Ikmal bahawa dia tidak boleh walikan Mentari kerana Mentari bukan anak kandungnya.

programme.title: Tmo Semerah Cinta Stileto
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Semerah Cinta Stileto

programme.title: Nadi Luna
programme.desc: Kisah Fira yang sibuk dengan persiapan sambutan hari jadi untuk Riyaan yang kelima. Dia sanggup berbelanja lebih untuk merealisasikan tema hari jadi Riyyan. Amri tidak bersetuju langsung kerana baginya semua itu membazir.

programme.title: Just The 3 Of Us

programme.title: Menantu Nista
programme.desc: Maria Mariana ialah sebuah filem jenayah tindakan prosedur polis berbahasa Melayu Malaysia 1996 arahan Yusof Haslam lakonan Erra Fazira, Ziana Zain, Edika Yusof dan Roy Azman. Ia berkisar tentang kisah dua beradik, Maria dan Mariana, yang sangat berbeza perwatakan.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep6
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Aku Nazmi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nazmi (Jay Iswazir) yang juga orang kurang upaya (OKU) mempunyai sebuah perniagaan dalam talian dengan bantuan sepupunya, Rafi. Pada suatu hari, Nazmi menghantar pesanan barang kepada seorang pelanggannya bernama Ilya (Ayda), seorang gadis pekak dan bisu. Nazmi tertarik dengan keperibadian Ilya. Dia ingin mengenali gadis itu dengan lebih dekat tetapi Puan Juha (Dato' Sheila Rusly), ibu kepada Ilya dan Inara (Dayana Roza) membantah hubungan mereka.

programme.title: Time Machine Ii
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.title: Silang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Amir seorang pereka grafik yang baru sahaja berkahwin dengan Dura. Selepas berkahwin, barulah Dura sedar yang Amir mempunyai masalah disleksia kronik dan anak mereka juga ada masalah sama.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep2
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Khalifahkah Aku
programme.desc: Kisah Fatah anak kepada Datuk Amran dan Datin Marissa. Kedua-dua ibu bapanya sibuk dengan urusan dunia dan kerap alpa dalam urusan ibadat seharian. Mereka menghantar Fatah belajar di sekolah agama dengan harapan dia menjadi anak yang soleh.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Maaf Dari Khilaf
programme.desc: Hasrat Bakar dan Salimah untuk memiliki zuriat tidak kesampaian apabila Salimah mengalami keguguran. Bakar panas hati kerana penantian zuriat selama 15 tahun berakhir dengan kejadian tragis. Dia tekad untuk mencari angkara siapa yang mencampak sampah dari tingkat atas rumah flatnya yang mengakibatkan keguguran kandungan isterinya. Pada masa yang sama, jiran mereka Rosnah berasa amat bersalah kerana dia tahu ini semua adalah salahnya.

programme.title: Tmo 3 2 1 Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem 3 2 1 Cinta

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Jeman
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang Jeman yang berusia 20an mengalami masalah lembam, ibunya meninggal dunia ketika melahirkannya.Jeman dibesarkan oleh neneknya Mak Wan. Manakala ayahnya Jalil sudah berkahwin lain.

programme.title: Den Budak Motor
programme.desc: Den Budak Motor mengisahkan tentang Deniel, seorang lelaki yang kecewa ditinggalkan oleh bekas kekasihnya, Sarah disebabkan kesusahan Deniel yang hanya memiliki motor kapcai.

programme.title: Mentari
programme.desc: Mentari meluahkan hasratnya untuk berkahwin dengan Firash. Namun ayahnya, Dato Ikmal sukar untuk melepaskan anak tunggal kesayangannya kerana dia bimbang akan kehilangan Mentari. Firash merupakan anak kawan baiknya sendiri. Di saat Mentari dan Firash akan disatukan, ibunya mengingatkan Dato Ikmal bahawa dia tidak boleh walikan Mentari kerana Mentari bukan anak kandungnya.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep7
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Arumi
programme.desc: Rasty menjemput empat rakannya, Merry, Widi, Rino dan Dika untuk melawat vila terbiar ibu bapanya. Rasty sudah lama tidak melawat vila itu - kira-kira 15 tahun sejak pembunuhan yang membimbangkan.

programme.title: Mat Kari Mek Tomyam
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Wanda yang sering bertemu dengan lelaki yang hampir melanggarnya tempoh hari. Setiap kali berjumpa, Azim akan menunjukkan sikapnya yang cuba untuk mengorat Wanda tetapi disangka buruk oleh Wanda yang menganggap Azim seorang yang gatal.

programme.title: Misteri Akil Balik
programme.desc: Kemunculan Akil di kampung halamannya semula telah menimbulkan persoalan orang kampung. Malah mereka merasakan sejak adanya Akil di kampung itu pelbagai perkara misteri berlaku. Terutamanya dua orang pemuda kampung yang nakal iaitu Oden dan Ucop kerana mereka merasakan sejak Akil muncul, Hani, Hanim dan Hanum sering tergila-gilakan Akil. Mereka berdua rasa tergugat.

programme.title: Tmo 3 2 1 Cinta
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem 3 2 1 Cinta

programme.title: Jasmine
programme.desc: Gerak manja Jasmine menyayangi dirinya membuatkan hati Zaman berdetik mencintai Jasmine. Sayang telah bertukar menjadi cinta tanpa dipinta. Untuk itu, walaupun diusia 33 tahun, Zaman masih sendiri. Hati Zaman terguris kala Jasmine menyatakan cintanya pada lelaki lain. Awal segala-gala pada Jasmine kerana Awal cinta pertamanya.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Pad Thai
programme.desc: Petchara, seorang penjual pad thai di pasar, menyertai pertandingan makan Pad-thai untuk memenangi harga satu juta baht. Dia mempunyai ramai pesaing yang bersedia untuk menang. Salah seorang daripada mereka ialah bekas teman lelakinya, Surachart, yang tidak mahu kehilangannya lagi. Dan Suchat, seorang guru muda yang merupakan jirannya yang mempunyai ramai peminat di kampungnya dan ramai pemuda top di kampungnya adalah tip untuk memenangi pertandingan ini. Perlumbaan untuk mencapai kemenangan bukanlah mudah.

programme.title: Preman Juga Berhak Bahagia
programme.desc: Johan, seorang samseng garang, bertemu semula dengan bekas kekasihnya yang dicabut saku oleh anak buahnya.

programme.title: Begitu Syulit Merazia Cintamu
programme.desc: Lionil dalam kehidupan sehariannya bekerja sebagai pegawai Satpol PP. Tetapi anehnya, Nadia, adik Lionil, sebenarnya berjualan di tepi jalan dan selalu diserbu. Lionil meminta Nadia berhenti tetapi Nadia berkeras untuk berdikari dan berjaya dalam perniaga

programme.title: D'Academy Asia 6 Ep17
programme.desc: D'Academy Asia dengan slogan "Suara Sejati Asia" adalah pertandingan menyanyi dangdut tingkat Asia. Negara berikutnya yang akan bergabung dalam DA Asia 6 adalah Trkiye! Bersiaplah menjadi bintang dangdut terbesar di Asia!

programme.title: Bongkar Cinta Pesulap Ganteng
programme.desc: Bimsalabim, apa yang terjadi? Eh, rupanya semasa sedang bersilap mata, Didin salah menyebut mantra dan Luna muncul sebagai jodohnya

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep24
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep13
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Satu Cinta Dua Hati Ep12
programme.desc: Rumah tangga Salwa dan Fahri dikurniakan dua cahaya mata iaitu Nayla dan Arsya. Perkahwinan yang pada asalnya penuh kebahagiaan kini berakhir dengan duka apabila Fahri memutuskan untuk meninggalkan keluarganya bagi merantau ke bandar demi mengejar kejayaa

programme.title: Trayek Angkutan Jodoh Jurusan KUA
programme.desc: Gea merasa bahagia sejak mengenali Julian, hingga Gea sanggup menjadi pemandu bas mini. Atas cadangan Julian, Gea bersetuju untuk berkahwin dengan pilihan ayahnya. Namun, menjelang hari perkahwinan, Gea berada dalam dilema dan hatinya terus mengingati Jul

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep220
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belaja

programme.title: Bocah Penjual Asinan Yang Sukses Menjadi Juara Dunia Matematika
programme.desc: Sejak kecil, Adit telah menjual asinan bersama neneknya. Hal ini menyebabkan Adit menjadi pandai dalam matematik. Apakah cerita lanjutannya?

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep222
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belaja

programme.title: Jalan-Jalan Sultan Ep5
programme.desc: Pengacara-pengacara meneroka beberapa destinasi pelancongan terbaik di Indonesia, dan bertanya soalan kepada beberapa pengunjung. Mereka yang menjawab dengan betul akan menerima hadiah.

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Miracle: Letters To The President
programme.desc: A math prodigy who dreams of building a small railway station in his village works hard to win the presidential math competition and present his petition to the President in person.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Fatal Intuition
programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire
programme.desc: 71 student-soldiers fight an impossible war against the elite 766 Commando Brigade and turn the tide of the Korean War.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: Perfect Game
programme.desc: On May 16, 1987, Korea's two greatest pitchers of the day, face off to determine who is the better pitcher, in an epic game that would go down in baseball history.

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?
programme.desc: A schoolteacher, Do-Kyung dies as he fails to save his student Ji-Yong from drowning. His wife Myung-Ji travels to Warsaw to stay away from the reality and meets an old friend.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: A washed-up former hit producer and a young man with stage fear while aspiring to be a singer head off on a road trip filled with music and jamming sessions.

programme.title: Going By The Book
programme.desc: Things get out of control when an eager traffic cop who tends to do things by the book was chosen to act as a bank robber in a drill.

programme.title: More Than Family
programme.desc: College student To-il was pregnant for 5 months and decided to marry her younger boyfriend. Her mother and stepfather opposed the decision, she hence set off to find her biological father.

programme.title: Always
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with a blind telemarketer and realizing her blindness was his fault, a former boxer decides to fight in an underground fighting contest to earn money for her surgery.

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: Kyung-mi with hearing impairment trying to save another girl from a killer becomes the prey herself. As the killer gains trust from the police, a life-threatening chase begins...

programme.title: A Man Of Reason
programme.desc: After being released from prison, a man learns that he has a daughter, thus wishes to leave the gangs and live an ordinary life. Yet the new leader of the gangs feels being betrayed...

programme.title: Josee
programme.desc: Yong Seok helps Jose to get home after finding she has fallen from her electric wheelchair. From then on, the two meet up more often and starts developing feeling for one another.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: Smugglers
programme.desc: The haenyeos are having trouble with collecting seafood under water because of the newly built factory nearby. To make a living, they started doing smuggling business...

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Don'T Go Too Far
programme.desc: While arguing on the division of their father's 2B inheritance, the eldest brother received a call to realize his son was kidnapped, and the ransom demanded was 2B...

programme.title: Waiting For Rain
programme.desc: An unmotivated student regains his passion for life after exchanging letters with his childhood friend and promise to meet if it rains on December 31st each year.

programme.title: Where Would You Like To Go?
programme.desc: A schoolteacher, Do-Kyung dies as he fails to save his student Ji-Yong from drowning. His wife Myung-Ji travels to Warsaw to stay away from the reality and meets an old friend.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: A disgraced Korean researcher claims to have successfully cloned human embryo stem cells. However, the results were revealed to be fabricated along with other unethical practices later.

programme.title: Deadman
programme.desc: An ace in the barge business makes money by selling his name, is falsely accused of embezzling billions. He fights to reclaim his stolen life from those tied to him solely by name.

programme.title: Fist & Furious
programme.desc: A former detective grants permission to a freelance video journalist to cover his revenge journey on a mob boss whom previously killed his partner during an investigation.

programme.title: Stellar: A Magical Ride
programme.desc: Chasing after a supercar in his father's beat-up Stellar, while being come after by local gangsters, Young Bae jog memories of his father bit by bit.

programme.title: The Accidental Detective
programme.desc: A crime-enthusiast blogger and a veteran detective team up to prove the innocence of their mutual friend who's been framed for a horrific murder.

programme.title: Actionhero
programme.desc: A college student dreaming to be an action star discovered an admission fraud. He decided to make an action film of him against the corrupted professor.

programme.title: 71: Into The Fire

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep507
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep5253
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep62
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep732
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3434
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1935
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep99
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4923
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: Call Me Agent
programme.desc: Miu Ling dreams of becoming a secret agent. Even though it seems impossible, she still harbours such a dream and hopes that it will soon come true. One day, Miu Ling rescues an injured secret agent who promises to make her his apprentice. From then on, her life is turned upside down and she goes onto a roller-coaster of madcap adventures.

programme.title: Mama's Affair
programme.desc: Former talent manager Mei Fung stays home to take care of her husband and son after retirement. She decides to re-enter the entertainment business to find her value in life, and successfully transforms a local restaurant delivery boy, Fong Ching, into a young pop idol. This makes her teenage son, Jonathan, intensely jealous of Fong Ching.

programme.title: The Brotherhood of Rebel
programme.desc: Chai, a triad member, helps his childhood friend Meow flee Hong Kong after discovering that Meow attempted to kill his triad boss. 17 years later, Chai becomes a key member of the triad. When he runs into Meow one day, he knows that his gang will kill Meow if they find him. Caught between triad and brotherhood, what will Chai choose?

programme.title: Septet: The Story of Hong Kong
programme.desc: Seven of Hong Kong's most revered directors, all with distinctly unique styles, come together for the first time to compose a symphony of stories for their city from the 50s to the future.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: Based on the 1954 martial arts novel by acclaimed author Liang Yu-sang, this film details the tragic romance between wild swordsman Zhuo Yi-hang and rival cult assassin Lien Ni-chang, with a dark, erotic and visually stunning twist.

programme.title: Seobok
programme.desc: Former secret agent Ki Hun is entrusted with a secret mission to escort the first human clone, Seobok, to a safe place. Seobok, who possesses a life-preserving DNA that could save humanity, explores the outside world with Ki Hun for the first time but they are both chased and claimed as terrorists by CIA. How can Ki Hun protect Seobok from danger?

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Dream Lover
programme.desc: Ka Shing meets Kitty one day and they fall quickly in love. However, Kitty disappears shortly and when they meet years later, she is already married. To comfort himself, Ka Shing asks a mystic master to let Kitty appear in his dreams so that he can be with her constantly, even though she can only be his dream lover...

programme.title: MMA Diva
programme.desc: Xin Lan takes over her fathers MMA club which is heavily in debt due to poor business. After He Hua defeated Xin Lan, she replaces her to become the new top MMA Diva and challenges Xin Lans MMA club to a duel. As Xin Lan is injured, she seeks help from a retried MMA superstar to fight the battle on her behalf to reclaim the clubs and her honour.

programme.title: Chungking Express
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong urban love stories depicting two Hong Kong policemen, both jilted by ex-lovers and falling in love again. One falls for a mysterious female underworld figure while the other is in love with a beautiful and witty server at a fast food restaurant he frequents.

programme.title: Leio
programme.desc: An ex-singer Kao returns to his hometown for a funeral and takes part in a water drilling contest to save his drought-stricken hometown, as well as to win a million dollar cash prize. However, what Kao and other contestants do not realize is that there is a fierce and deadly beast lurking underground who wants to eat them all!

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score

programme.title: My Love
programme.desc: Adapted from a Korean movie, this is the love story of school swimmer Zhou Xiao Qi and a transfer student You Yong Ci. Zhou falls in love with You at first sight in high school but You leaves suddenly one day without saying goodbye. As fate brings them back together years later, can they get the spark back in their relationship?

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair II
programme.desc: Powerful, insane and obsessed with hatred, the bride with white hair has gone on a killing rampage, and can only be stopped by the one person she loves.

programme.title: The Invisible Guest
programme.desc: Young and beautiful entrepreneur Joanna is a prime suspect in a locked-room murder where her lover is found dead. She pays off a police officer to prove her innocence. During the investigation, they discover another murder case involving Joanna and her lover, and eventually reveals the truth.

programme.title: Ready O/R Rot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi are finally getting married but pressure from Guys mother creates much friction between them. Meanwhile, Grey Bear suspects his wife of cheating on him and Ken faces the biggest crisis of his life when Jessica accidentally gets pregnant. Can they eventually solve their relationship problems?

programme.title: A Cool Fish
programme.desc: In this dark-comedy, cop-turned-security guard Ma faces the ultimate challenge when his boss mysteriously disappears and his paralyzed sister makes a morbid deal with the armed bandits who abduct her.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: May Who?
programme.desc: The story is about a super standard girl in school, May Who, is on a quest to win the love of a school senior heart-throbber, Fame, with her new-found friend, Pong. The only secret is that she can discharge electricity when she gets excited

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: In this chaotic world, every city has its own "navigators" who can help solve various relationship issues. Bar owner Chen and his partner Guan are legendary navigators, but in the process of helping a girl Xiao Yu, they must also face their own problems in an epic act of self-discovery that brings their lives from towering highs to withering lows.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: A school bus accident kills almost everyone on board. The bus driver got injured and partially lost his memory while rescuing one of the boys. To thank the driver, the boys dad, Wang, brings him to live with the family in their basement. However, the driver soon discovers strange behaviours from the Wangs which seem to be related to the accident.

programme.title: Wolf Hiding
programme.desc: A cold-blooded killer, Chen An vows to take revenge for her sister who was killed by a crime gang. Dealing with the police and the triad at the same time, a final battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: Dragon Master: Dragon Spell
programme.desc: The Dragon King is locked in a seal by the Dragon Master for 500 years, and his daughter must travel back in time to 500 years ago to kill the Dragon Master, in order to reverse the act. Little did she know that the Dragon King and Dragon Master were close friends back then

programme.title: Secret Diary of a Mom To Be, The
programme.desc: A high-flying PR manager and her loving husband swear by a childless lifestyle but she is shocked to learn that she is expecting just when things look bright for a promotion! How would they deal with the unexpected surprises that life throws in their way?

programme.title: Back Home
programme.desc: Wing has been able to see ghosts since young. When his mothers suicide attempt forces him to return to Hong Kong and the home he ran away from, he discovers that the horrific visions that once haunted him have become worse. Caught between the living and the dead, Wing must bring the truth to light to be free.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Songfest
programme.desc: As its name implies, Songfest is an Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musical, traditionally Chinese and timeless in content; yet revealing a spirited and modern technique. Shot on location at Taiwan's beautiful Sun-Moon Lake, it's a turbulent romance between a passionate tea picker Sung Yu Lan and a charming fisherman Li Chun Yang.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 3
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong go to Iron Palm Peak to search for the Book of Wumu. The chief of Iron Palm discovers their visit, and seriously injures Huang. It seems only the Southern Emperor Duan can heal her, but will Huang be healed in time?

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Swordsman Ding fought against many swordsmen and won, so he took his first defeat badly and wanted to commit suicide. It is then that he meets the granddaughter of a mystic Sect leader and falls in love. When they want to get married, the Sect leader presents Ding with the Full Moon Scimitar, on the condition that he will never leave the sect.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: Killers On Wheels
programme.desc: Kuo takes his family to an outlying island of Hong Kong for a vacation. On the ferry, they meet a group of young hooligans cum motorcyclists called the speed gang, led by Johnny, and Kuos sister Carrie is molested by Johnnys brother Michael. Kuos family continues to be harassed by the speed gang while on the island can Kuo protect them?

programme.title: Intimate Confessions of a Chinese Courtesan
programme.desc: Young Ai Nu is abducted and sold to the popular Four Seasons brothel run by the powerful and ruthless Madam Chun Yi. Ai Nu gets locked up in a dungeon due to her fiery attitude. Soon, a murder occurs within the brothel and a policeman must race against time to prevent a vicious revenge plot from reaching its blood-spattered conclusion.

programme.title: Legend of the Bat
programme.desc: It is rumoured that people can buy anything they desire on the mysterious Island of Bats so long as they have money. The charismatic swordsman Chu Liu Xiang and his friend travel to the island to seek answers but realize they are not the only ones who want to unveil the mystery of this place.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: Filmmaker Wong Jing produced Mercenaries From Hong Kong, his very first modern-day adventure drama. In the dramatic plot he wrote, he sends superstars Ti Lung, Chen Hui-min, Wang Lung-wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu on a deadly mission. The film's action sequences are all closely guided by three great kung fu choreographers, led by Tang Chia!

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Long Road to Gallantry
programme.desc: Tu Meng Fei makes his way to the world after completing his kung fu training. En route, he rescues Mu Wan Erh and Li San Nan from a band of thugs and later learnt of a 20-year conflict between the evil Thunder Gang Chief Leng Tian Lei and the Dragon Sect. Mus lost father is none other than the Thunder Gang Chief, who also killed Lis father

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: Zhang and Jins daughter, Peony, are betrothed at birth but Jin objects to the engagement now. Zhang meets a carp spirit that looks exactly like Peony and they fall in love. When Justice Bao is asked by Jin to distinguish Peony from her replica, he decides to quit the case when he witness the true love between Zhang and the carp spirit.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: Summer Heat
programme.desc: Aptly described by its original title of "Money, Sex And Love", this is a gripping drama about Judy, a woman with a rich husband as well as two lovers who happen to be brothers. Jenny Hu is Judy, and her knockout beauty makes this summer sizzle...

programme.title: Heaven Sword and Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: In the Yuan Dynasty, martial artists everywhere battle for the Heaven Sword and the Dragon Sabre, as only when these two powerful weapons combine can a secret be revealed to help one become the king of the martial arts world. As Zhang Wu Ji acquires the skills from Nine Yang Scriptures by chance, he is also embroiled in this lengthy battle.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Heaven and Hell
programme.desc: When an angel, Ling, decides to help his two friends who have fallen in love to escape from Heaven, he is sent to live as a human on earth as his punishment. Reincarnated as a cab driver, he sacrifices his own life to save another ill-fated couple and lands in hell, where he has to face off against the ghosts and demons to fight his way out!

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: The New Shaolin Boxers
programme.desc: Young carriage driver Kin offends the gangsters by saving a young girl. His boss immediately fires him to avoid getting into trouble. Since then, Kin is determined to protect the weak and learns the Tsai Li Fu style of martial arts from a Shaolin master to challenge the gangsters, finally beating them.

programme.title: Killer Clans
programme.desc: This intriguing wuxia saga is packed with conspiracies, power schemes and sword fights to produce a perfect blend of great action and gripping drama. The movie centres around the struggle for underworld supremacy between two clans, where the line between good and evil is not always that clear-cut.

programme.title: Life Gamble
programme.desc: Martial arts master Yu has retired for years but is invited to join force with another master Tao to fight against the four famous thieves and retrieve the stolen Dragon Jade. However, Taos real plan is to possess the treasure himself and kills Yu after he defeats the thieves...

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wens brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wens home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: The Sword of Swords
programme.desc: The Sword Master passes on his sword to his disciple Lin before he dies. Another disciple Fang also eyes the sword and plots to take it away from Lin, destroying his family and blinding him in the process. Lin finally battles Fang for revenge and vows to reclaim his sword.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brothers death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Brave Archer 2
programme.desc: Knowing Guo Jing has won Huang Rongs hand in marriage using the kung fu learned from Jiu Yin manual, Ouyang Feng captures Huang and agrees to release her only if Guo can dictate the content of the manual. Will Guo give in to the threat?

programme.title: THE AMOROUS LOTUS PAN
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husbands playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Invincible Shaolin
programme.desc: An evil Qing general comes up with a plan to rid the Shaolin masters once and for all. He invites three Northern Shaolin experts to fight against three Southern Shaolin disciples. After the contest, the general secretly kills the Southerners and places the blame on the Northerners. This leads to in-fighting between both Shaolin schools.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: Demon of the Lute
programme.desc: Lute demon Chin Mo has reappeared in the world to wreak havoc. Hsiao Feng Ling is ordered to help find a special bow and arrows that can counter the demon. Only Chiao Yin knows the whereabouts of the weapon. Hsiao and her classmate Old Naughty set out on an arduous journey to find Chiao. After overcoming many obstacles, they catch Chin Mo's man trying to snatch the bow and manage to stop him in time....

programme.title: Hagola Ep69
programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: A conversational comedy, set in the northern heartlands of India, transports kids into the world of three crazy friends - Hathgola, Goli and Lattha

programme.desc: In the fictional world of Suryanagari, reside two little superheroes Prince Jai and his friend Viru. Their friendship and loyalty, stands in the way of Minister Jeevans successively unsuccessful plots to become the king of Suryanagari.

programme.desc: Butterflies - Andy's world explodes when a fresh-faced university student is killed in a random shooting, and a bullet hits Andy, lodging in her vest.

programme.title: The Rookie S6 Ep4
programme.desc: Training Day - Its Officer Aaron Thorsens first day back since the assault, and hes tasked with a series of high-stress cases to determine whether hes ready to work. Elsewhere, the team investigates a homicide case with a potential tie to the pentagram killer.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Rat Packed - The CSI team is called to investigate when the bodies of Frank Sinatra and Joey Bishop impersonators are discovered behind the drywall of a home construction project. Also, Folsom must face the review board about the future of his career.

programme.title: CSI: Miami S10 Ep7
programme.desc: Sinner Takes All - A high stakes poker game is disrupted by a masked assassin, leaving one player dead and the CSIs baffled.

programme.title: Wipeout S9 Ep12
programme.desc: The Wipeout Bunch - With $25,000 at stake, Zombie Scare Actors, a Blended Family, and a pair of hopeful Chiropractors take on the Wipeout course, including obstacles like the all-new Shimmy Shaker.

programme.title: FBI S6 Ep13
programme.desc: Ring Of Fire - The Somalian terrorist group behind the death of Agent Hobbs resurfaces, sending the team on a chase to take them down for good.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S14 Ep5
programme.desc: Qualifier 3 (Part 1) - The qualifiers continue at the Tacoma Dome with a new generation of ninjas facing up to six challenging obstacles, including the new Air Surfer and Pretzel Twist in addition to the iconic Warped Wall.

programme.title: The Rookie S6 Ep5
programme.desc: The Vow - When a toddler is found at the scene of a crime, John and Bailey must decide whether to let the child go to a shelter for the night or care for her themselves. Meanwhile, Tim dissapears when someone from his past returns and leaves Lucy in the dark.

programme.title: CSI: Vegas S3 Ep4
programme.desc: Health And Wellness - As the CSI team investigates the death of a man visiting Las Vegas for a health and wellness convention, a fiery explosion traps Allie Rajan in the basement of an abandoned hospital.

programme.title: FBI: International S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Red Light - When a wild night in Amsterdam for three ex-Navy men ends with one found dead in his hotel room, the Fly Team must dive into the red-light district to hunt down his killer.

programme.title: CSI: Miami S10 Ep8
programme.desc: Dead Ringer - When Horatio finds another corpse with missing eyes, everything points to his nemesis, The Taunter - except he has an airtight alibi.

programme.title: Bonanza S2 Ep07

programme.desc: A whistle stop tour of some of Canada's most iconic foods.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Oceans - Wildlife cameraman, Gordon Buchanan leads a team using specially designed on board cameras to film ground-breaking new behaviour in some of the animals who depend on our oceans.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rome - Joanna continues her travels to Rome, a city like no other on earth. She zips into the city on the back of a Vespa to get her first glimpse of the beauty that awaits.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Inspect an abandoned silo complex repurposed into a show-stopping art gallery, then visit a family home carved out of an ancient fortress.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Iceland - In this episode Robson heads to Iceland where he challenges a local fishing expert to a fishing contest.

programme.title: Macaque Island 1 - The Young Up-Start Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the lush treed cityscape where fluffy male Matnoor rules over the 30-member-strong Street Troop with an iron fist. Then meet Aarav, the old alpha who oversees the wilder Hill Troop. Which will up-and-comer Loci challenge for the crown?

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Earth Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Squirrel Monkey Island Ep2
programme.desc: Travel deep into the Columbian rainforest, where its mating season for one of the most clever monkey species in the world. Witness the most important time of year for male squirrel monkeys that have been bulking up to impress females for months.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Social Animals Ep5
programme.desc: Cooperation comes in many forms. Some animals cooperate to be social while others put the welfare of the group above their own reproductive potential. See the many ways species have evolved to work with one another in order to survive.

programme.title: Supersenses 1 - Invisible World Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into a dazzling world beyond human perception, where animals use their super senses to detect light we cant see, sound we cant hear and even stranger forces we cant begin to detect.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Land of the Secret Rhino Ep2
programme.desc: The grasslands of Northeast India are one of the most fertile habitats on earth. Hundreds of species of tall grass flourish here, allowing one of Indias most iconic creatures to thrive the Greater One-horned Rhino. This is one of the last places on earth where this gentle giant survives. Rani, an adult female has just had a baby, Rajah. This young rhino calf is only 3-month-old and his mom is his teacher, for the first year and half of his life. Rajah has much to learn, as he gets to grips with the world around him and everything there is to know about being a rhino.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Shark Dentist Ep6
programme.desc: Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Endangered Species Ep5
programme.desc: With seven of Ontarios eight turtle species listed as endangered, the push is on to keep population numbers up. But turtles are slow, which means they keep taking a beating from both predators and cars. Can they be saved?

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Shark Dentist Ep6

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Return of the Light Ep2
programme.desc: Experience the north Atlantics intense, brief summer with its animal residents. Follow Arctic fox cubs learning to hunt for survival, an otter pup going solo for the first time, a mate-seeking puffin, and tiny reindeer taking their first steps.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 - Ancient Lineages Ep6
programme.desc: Some call them living fossils, but that's just another way to say survivors. From the shark to the horseshoe crab, these animals' early adaptations were a success, leaving them relatively unchanged for millions of years.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - The Damning Truth Ep6
programme.desc: A dam is an engineering feat, controlling massive amounts of water. But it can also wreak havoc on the animals that call those waters home.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - The Power of Playtime Ep1
programme.desc: Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - Wild Stallions of the Himalayas Ep3
programme.desc: The high altitude Ladakh plateau in northwest India is a land of extremes. The air is thin and the mountain landscape treacherous; winters are freezing, while summers are scorching hot. The Tibetan wild ass is king of these grasslands, and one old stallion has developed a way to stay one step ahead of his rivals. We follow Dorje as he shadows a herd of females and foals, from winter to summer, when he will get his chance to sire the next generation. But to win his prize he must eventually do battle with other stallions - all wanting his crown!

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Islands Ep2
programme.desc: Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Wild Latin America 1 - Realm of the Spectacled Bear Ep3
programme.desc: Get to know South Americas only bear species. Witness the shy and charismatic spectacled bear play, forage, and look for mates at the secluded Chaparri Ecological Reserve in Northern Peru.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Out of the Darkness Ep1
programme.desc: Winter releases her iron grip. In Iceland Arctic foxes scurry across mountains to mate. In Shetland an otter raises her cubs. In Norway a vast reindeer herd descends to the calving grounds. A huge March storm rages across the Stormborn lands.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Riddles of the Dead Ep1
programme.desc: The Black Rhino is the most endangered species in the world and when they start dying in rapid success, Ol Pejeta brings their expertise to help figure out whats killing thembefore its too late.

programme.title: Great Lakes Wild 1 - Creatures of the Night Ep7
programme.desc: Flying squirrels leaping through the air is quite a sight - especially for researchers who know theyre not supposed to be here. The Southern flying squirrel, typically found along the shores of Lake Erie, is now moving its territory up towards Lake Ontario and beyond thanks to warmer winters.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - A Sloth Bear's Dilemma Ep4
programme.desc: In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year its harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Lost World of the Yucatan Ep1
programme.desc: The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexicos largest predator: Morelets crocodile.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Lost World of the Yucatan Ep1
programme.desc: The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexicos largest predator: Morelets crocodile.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Autumn Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn in Africa brings opportunities. Cape Fur seals, Samango monkeys, chameleons, impala, and more respond to the season. Autumn triggers changes in the lives of many animals. Rare creatures reveal themselves and predators gather to take advantage.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Year 1 - Winter Ep4
programme.desc: Be an eyewitness to the death and resurrection that winter brings to Africa. Observe what comes with shorter days, from drought conditions to frigid winds, and marvel at the survival skills of animals and plants as they face the seasons fury.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 3 - Riddles of the Dead Ep1
programme.desc: The Black Rhino is the most endangered species in the world and when they start dying in rapid success, Ol Pejeta brings their expertise to help figure out whats killing thembefore its too late.

programme.title: Animals at Play 1 - Rules of the Game Ep2
programme.desc: Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Into the Wild India 1 - A Sloth Bear's Dilemma Ep4
programme.desc: In a land of searing summer heat and thunderous tropical storms, life for all that live on the plains of southern India is tough. But this year its harder than ever as the monsoon rains are late to arrive. For Bibi, a female sloth bear with two young cubs, this will be the biggest challenge of her life. With no rainfall, food will be hard to find and her cubs are also open to attack from leopards and other bears. Bibi must guide her family through this tricky time. Does she have the experience for them all to survive?

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Bound By Blood Ep1
programme.desc: The southwest corner of New Zealands South Island is hemmed in by giant mountains and the rough Pacific Ocean. Rare penguins are locked in a daily game of cat and mouse with giant New Zealand sea lions. The sea lions also live in a tumultuous world, where pups must battle the elements to survive.

programme.title: Shadowlands 1 - Life in Dark Water Ep2
programme.desc: In southwestern New Zealand, deep fiords and tidal lagoons are wrapped in green rainforest. The dark fjords harbor creatures normally found in the deep. As winter approaches, bottlenose dolphins must escape their freezing fjord, while in a mountain river, a longfin eel heeds the call of the sea.

programme.title: Evolution Earth 1 - Heat Ep3
programme.desc: Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 - Lost World of the Yucatan Ep1
programme.desc: The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexicos largest predator: Morelets crocodile.

programme.desc: The Cleat without Feet / Real Magic - When Phoebe accidentally knocks Harper's soccer cleat off the balcony before the big game, the Dew Drops must venture into the city to retrieve the cleat. / When Dylan starts practicing magic tricks, Athena thinks his magic is real! But when the Dew Drops investigate his magic hat, they accidentally break it and must fix it before Dylans magic show for the neighborhood kids.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep21
programme.desc: Grug V Gurg / Unfair Fair - Grug wants a day off from his honey-do-list so he subs in doppelganger Gurg/Eep and Thunk set out to sabotage Bulk and Sulk's "idea fair" project because they always win even though Snoot comes up with the ideas.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep22
programme.desc: Baby Face Off / The Pursuit Of Wrinkliness - Thunk babysits Sandy and new baby Cliff to prove his responsible. Cliff is a jerk and keeps getting Sandy in trouble/Gran worries that Thunk isn't tough enough to survive to adulthood because he likes to hang out with old people, so she puts him through a series of toughness tests.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep27
programme.desc: Bossa Nova - After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroups other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep28
programme.desc: The Museum Job - When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first missionand then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep29
programme.desc: Ga Ba Goo Ba Ga (The Babblist) - Theres a new babblist in town- someone who claims to understand baby talk. Boss Baby spots this fraud right away;and must debunk his tactics before he scams the playgroup parents. Meanwhile;Tim tries to sell magazines with Boss Babys help.

programme.desc: Rebirth - When a Galra monster descends upon the Balmera, Team Voltron must find a way to save the deteriorating living planet and its alien inhabitants

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep36
programme.desc: Super Smash Siblings / A Hole In Grug - Eep and Thunk compete against their classmates in Ahhh-Smashin/After being denied a spot on the Valley's Wall of Fame, Grug creates a new game

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep10
programme.desc: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt - Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10

Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep36
programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Olivia Ep21
programme.desc: Olivia And The Babies - After noticing all the great compliments Mother receives on account of adorable baby William, Olivia finds herself some babies of her own: her cat Edwin and her dog Perry. Being a mum is tougher than it seems, but when Mother asks Olivia to watch William for a minute, her new skills come in handy.

programme.title: Olivia Ep22
programme.desc: Olivia's Pirate Treasure - When Olivia and her family go to the beach, Olivia finds what she thinks is a pearl-making oyster. She enlists Ian and Julian to help her find more, imagining that they're pirates in search of buried treasure. In reality, Father explains that they've actually found clams: no pearls inside, but great for a clambake!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep19
programme.desc: Heavy Loader - Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep5

Thanks to Tags handiness - and one of Lady Lydias hats - they make it to the party just in time. \ Pawstons new canine mail carrier keeps getting chased by dogs, so Tag and Scooch have to help him deliver the mail.
